Article.ArticleTitle: The Molecular Key to Understanding the Medical Ozone Action.

AbstractText: Currently, treatment with medical ozone (MO) is considered one of the most interesting and safe integrative options that can effectively complement many conventional medical therapies, mainly, but not exclusively, involving aging and pain [...].

AffiliationInfo.Affiliation: Clinical Pharmacology, Marche Polytechnic University, 60128 Ancona, Italy.
